text: Francesco Perrone (3 December 1930 - 27 April 2020) was an Italian long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1960 Summer Olympics. Perrone was an athlete of the Gruppo Sportivo Fiamme Oro. He was born in Cellino San Marco, Italy. Perrone died of COVID-19 on 27 April 2020 in Bari, Italy at the age of 89.Ucciso dal virus il maratoneta che aveva sfidato Abebe Bikila ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy Category:Italian long-distance runners Category:Olympians for Italy
title: Francesco Perrone
